GIVE WILDLIFE
A CHANCE TO SURVIVE

Donate for WILDLIFE now!

GIVE WILDLIFE
A CHANCE TO SURVIVE

Donate for WILDLIFE now!

OUR ACHIEVEMENTS – POWERED BY YOU

Every success WildAct has achieved is a result of the collective efforts and contributions from our community. You are a vital piece of the puzzle, helping us create even greater impact for wildlife and conservation.

Join us in making meaningful changes for nature. Together, we can protect biodiversity and build a sustainable future.

3,365

Lives secured
through trap removal

165

Illegal camps
dismantled

6,160

Meters of bird nets
eliminated, safeguarding

wild birds

4,000+

Local people signed the

commitment in protecting

migratory birds

50

Women’s Union officers

trained to lead migratory

bird conservation project

7,000+

Students and teachers

joined our awareness

raising events.

The 1st

Master’s programme in

conservation in Vietnam

to be launched in 2025!

WE BUILD PROJECTS THAT CREATE REAL IMPACT!

EVIDENCE-BASED CONSERVATION

Conservation is most effective when it is guided by science and shaped by those who live closest to nature. At WildAct, we design every initiative – whether it’s strengthening local capacity, tackling wildlife crime, empowering women, or monitoring endangered species – using solid research and real-world insights.

LOCAL & ETHNIC MINORITY EMPOWERMENT

Amidst the towering trees of Chư Yang Sin National Park, footsteps weave through the dense forest – those of rangers dedicated to its protection and former hunters who once depended on its resources. Today, these individuals, members of the H’Mong community, stand as defenders of the very land that once sustained them.

WOMEN LEADERSHIP & EQUITY

In many communities, women play an essential role in protecting nature, yet few are recognised as forest rangers, biodiversity researchers, or conservation leaders. Their challenges extend beyond professional limitations – many also face gender-based violence, discrimination, and unsafe working conditions. Creating a more inclusive and equitable conservation sector is not just necessary – it is vital for lasting and effective environmental protection.

EDUCATION

Vietnam is one of the world’s most biodiverse nations, yet it has long lacked a formal education system dedicated to conservation. Recognising this pressing need, WildAct has made inclusive and accessible education a core pillar of its mission, ensuring the next generation is equipped to safeguard Vietnam’s natural heritage.

CREATE IMPACTS WITH US

BUSINESSES

Keep both your company and the Earth in the green.
We believe a thriving business starts with a thriving planet. Together, we design out-of-the-box, impact-driven solutions that align sustainability with your business vision.

SCHOOL & UNIVERSITY

Join us in shaping a future generation that is compassionate, empathetic, and dedicated to protecting wildlife and the environment.

MEDIA

We believe media is a powerful ally in raising community awareness and inspiring care for the environment and wildlife. Join us in delivering impactful and meaningful news to audiences.

INDIVIDUALS

“Every small contribution creates great value”.

we offer practical and meaningful ways for you to make a difference as an individual who cares about the environment and wildlife.
